title: The Dark Jar: A Collection of Short Stories by Bruce Memblatt
description: A collection of 17 short stories by Bruce Memblatt that are so smart, so daring, so clever, so scary and so much fun that you will never put them down!Titles A Bottle for Sandra, Alien Dish, Almost Zombie, Music Man, Return, Bad to the Bone, Victim Number 13 and The Last Station, about which Fangoria "The Last Station‚Äù by Bruce Memblatt is absorbing in its structure and sense of anticipation. What starts out like a police procedural, as two detectives interrogate a murder suspect, unexpectedly takes a creative twist into the supernatural."
author: Bruce Memblatt
